short.es: Just select a word in the page you're reading. Right-click on it and "Get the meaning for" it. Not_A_Translator will provide an…
short.fr: Defines unknown words in native language without breaking reading : English and Spanish supported so far.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just select a word in the web page you're reading. Right-click on it and "Get the meaning for" it. Not_A_Translator will provide an inline tooltip with the meaning of the word in its native language. Why ? Because it may be better to get a definition of a word in its own language to learn this language and because it doesn't break the process of reading an article as getting on another page to translate a word would do.

supported dictionaries : 
English, Spanish, French, Deutsch, Italian

supported locales : 
english, french, spanish

updates : 
--> 2.9 : bug fixes, language detection management improvement.
---> heartbreaking high treason feature : quick translate
---> multi-tab language detection improved
---> added 2 dictionaries : German and Italian !
---> added langdetect disabling on disable feature.
---> auto-disable lang autodetect when changing dictionary
---> Donate through Leetchi !
---> Appearance improved.
---> New feature 2.1: remove tooltip
---> New feature 1.8: Lang autodetect.
---> New dictionaries added !
long.es: Just select a word in the page you're reading. Right-click on it and "Get the meaning for" it. Not_A_Translator will provide an inline tooltip with the meaning of the word in its native language. English and Spanish supported so far. Why ? Because it may be better to get a definition of a word in its own language to learn this language and because it doesn't break the process of reading an article as getting on another page to translate a word would do.
long.fr: Defines unknown words in native language without breaking reading : English and Spanish supported so far.
